attributes.title: this app... just no
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app everything went bad. i went to the microwave and it caught on fire. then my screen kept glitching and a screen popped up of trump and it turned off my phone.
Worst app hands down I opened it to a squirrel getting killed then a pic of trump that know one wants to see and it’s gross

attributes.title: Wow😡
attributes.review: please next time be thoughtful about what you put available on the App Store it’s promoting a Cheeto puff. I will be manifesting this apps downfall #trumpisoverparty 😡🔫🔫

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: This app should not exist. It is inappropriate and disturbing. This app needs to be taken down. I got on the and I saw a constipated orange man with a bad hair cut. This is unacceptable.

attributes.title: I am disgusted
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw a burnt chicken nugget doing things I did not want to see then the same chicken nugget started to strip on a pole

attributes.title: scared and disgusted
attributes.review: i opened the app to see a cheeto making a similar fist as the dictator and murderer Adolf Hitler. genuinely scared for the safety of america :) would rate 0 if i could.

attributes.title: Whoops💫🥰🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: I thought this was the annoying orange app! Turns out I was kinda right but still not what I was looking for💞🍊🤩

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: This app is the most horrible app I have ever used!! Don’t even bother downloading, save your time!!!

attributes.title: the worst programming i have ever witnessed
attributes.review: my phone screen actually broke the second i opened it then on top of that it just blacked screened. i think it was self homicide out of embarrassment cuz let’s be real who wants to have the trump app. man is the biggest cheeto clown. big hate.

attributes.title: I am...disgusted.😐
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a saggy cheeto looking orangutan on my screen. I started getting so sick to my stomach 🤮 what a disgrace to the world 😪🤦🏽‍♀️
